author: gartung
body: On macOS uint is not defined for gcc6. Change uint to unsigned int to allow genereflex to work. Updated classes_def.xml because function signature changed. Found while compiling fwlite on macOS 10.10 and 10.12 with gcc 6.3.0.
title: DataFormats/L1Trigger: fix to allow dictionary library to compile on macOS with gcc6.3.0
